committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Trails System Act to study the feasibility of establishing a Florida Frontiers Spanish Heritage Trail in Northeast Florida, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the Florida Frontiers Spanish Heritage Trail, extending from Fernandina to Saint Augustine, Florida.

titles.title: To amend the National Trails System Act to study the feasibility of establishing a Florida Frontiers Spanish Heritage Trail in Northeast Florida, and for other purposes.
